cookies.backend.wrong_version: Your version of the mod is outdated, please download a newer version to use the backend!
cookies.config.cleanup.coop_cleanup.name: Collection tooltips
cookies.config.cleanup.coop_cleanup.tool: Hides the names of coop members from the collection item.
cookies.config.cleanup.name: Cleanup
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_actions.to: Removes the left-click and right-click actions from the pet.
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_dungeon_st: Removes the dungeon stats from items.
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_full_set_b: Removes the full set bonus from the item.
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_gear_score: Removes the gear score from items.
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_gemstone_l: Removes the gemstone line from items.
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_gemstone_s: Remove the gemstone stats from items.
Removes the left-click and right-click actions from the pet.
Removes the hot potato book stats from items.
Removes the max level and xp lines from pets.
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_piece_bonu: Remove the piece bonus from items.
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_reforge_st: Removes the reforge stats from items.
cookies.config.cleanup.remove_runes.name: Remove runes
Removes the soulbound text from items.
cookies.config.cleanup.tooltip: Various cleanup settings, that either hide or modify what you see.
cookies.config.dev.backend.connect.name: Connect to backend
cookies.config.dev.backend.connect.toolt: Whether the mod should connect to the backend or not.
cookies.config.dev.backend.server.name: Server Url
cookies.config.dev.backend.server.toolti: Used to set the backend server url.
cookies.config.dev.backend.version_suffi: Appends the current api version to the url.
cookies.config.dev.data_repo.branch.name: Data repo branch
cookies.config.dev.data_repo.branch.tool: The branch of the data repo.
cookies.config.dev.data_repo.name: Data repo
cookies.config.dev.data_repo.tooltip: The github location of the data repo.
cookies.config.dev.hide_console_spam.too: Removes spam from the console by canceling various logger invocations.
cookies.config.dev.name: Dev Config
cookies.config.dev.show_plot_price_break: Shows a breakdown of how much compost you need to unlock all plots.
cookies.config.dungeon.name: Dungeon Config
cookies.config.dungeon.player_glow_by_cl: Overrides the default hypixel glowing by rank to glow by class color.
cookies.config.dungeon.puzzle.creeper_be: Enables the creeper beams puzzle solver.
cookies.config.dungeon.puzzle.higher_or_: Enables the higher or lower puzzle solver.
cookies.config.dungeon.puzzle.name: Puzzles
cookies.config.dungeon.puzzle.three_weir: Enables the three weirdos puzzle solver.
cookies.config.dungeon.puzzle.water_boar:
The original oneflow solver was created by Desco1
check out their Github at Desco1/WaterSolver
Furthermore thank you to drek1984, Jade and bonsai
which where helping Desco1 with the original
and as well skytils for parts of the original solver.
cookies.config.dungeon.render.keep_withe: Prevents wither doors from changing to normal ones.
cookies.config.dungeon.render.map.name: Enable map
cookies.config.dungeon.render.map.reposi: Use + and - to change size of selected element
Allows you to scale and move the dungeon map.
cookies.config.dungeon.render.map.toolti: Enables or disables the map rendering. This will not disable the underlying features.
cookies.config.dungeon.render.map_backgr: The color to use for the map background
Renders a monochrome background behind the map.
Renders the player name over the dungeon room text.
cookies.config.dungeon.render.room_statu: Shows the current room status as color.
cookies.config.dungeon.render.rotate_pla: Rotate the player skulls to the direction they are looking, else draw an arrow showing it instead.
cookies.config.dungeon.render.show_playe: Shows the names of the players on the map.
Shows the player skull instead of the map marker.
cookies.config.dungeon.render.show_puzzl: Always shows the trap as cleared (white text) instead of opened (red text).
cookies.config.dungeon.render.show_secre: Shows information about the secrets in rooms.
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.class: The colors used for every class
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.color: Changes the background color of the ui widgets.
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.modif: Changes the default ui if there is exactly one player per class.
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.name: Spirit Leap
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.show_: Shows the dungeon map in the ui.
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.sort_: Sorts the players by their class in the spirit overlay.
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.toolt: Settings related to the spirit leap ui.
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.use_c: Uses the class colors instead of the default color.
cookies.config.dungeon.spirit_leap.use_h: Uses the player heads instead of the class items.
cookies.config.dungeon.terminal.chane_al: Enables the change all to same solver.
cookies.config.dungeon.terminal.click_in: Enables the click in order solver.
cookies.config.dungeon.terminal.correct_: Enables the correct all panes solver.
cookies.config.dungeon.terminal.name: Terminals
cookies.config.dungeon.terminal.prevent_: Prevents you from clicking wrong options.
cookies.config.dungeon.terminal.select_a: Enables the select all colors solver.
cookies.config.dungeon.use_backend.name: Relay to backend
cookies.config.dungeon.use_backend.toolt: Whether information should be exchanged with the backend or not
cookies.config.dungeon.use_features.name: Enabled dungeon features
cookies.config.dungeon.use_features.tool: Enables or disables all dungeon features. This will not work for ongoing runs.
cookies.config.farming.compost_sort_orde: How the items should be sorted.
cookies.config.farming.highlight_unclaim: Highlight unclaimed jacob contests in his inventory.
cookies.config.farming.name: Farming Config
cookies.config.farming.show_compost_pric: Shows the amount of items required to max an upgrade.
cookies.config.farming.show_rancher_opti: Show optimal speeds in the rancher's boots.
cookies.config.farming.show_rancher_spee: Shows the speed selected on ranchers boots as item stack size.
cookies.config.farming.squeaky_mouse_mat: Enables an overlay for the squeaky mousemat where you can save yaw/pitch for every crop.
cookies.config.farming.visitor_drop_prot: Prevents rejecting visitors with rare drops
cookies.config.farming.visitor_material_: Shows the amount of items a visitor needs down to the actual crop.
cookies.config.farming.yaw_pitch_display: Displays your yaw/pitch on the screen (in a non obnoxious way).
cookies.config.helpers.anvil_helper.name: Anvil Helper
cookies.config.helpers.anvil_helper.tool: Highlights the same book in your inventory when combining them in an anvil.
cookies.config.helpers.chest_tracker.too: Allows for tracking of chests on private island.
cookies.config.helpers.craft_helper.loca: Edits the location of the craft helper.
cookies.config.helpers.craft_helper.name: Craft Helper
cookies.config.helpers.craft_helper.sett: Shows the items required to craft something and your progress in the inventory.
cookies.config.helpers.craft_helper.sour: Allows you to modify the available item sources.
cookies.config.helpers.craft_helper.tool: Settings related to the craft helper
cookies.config.helpers.name: Helpers
cookies.config.helpers.tooltip: Settings that help you with keeping track of certain things.
cookies.config.item_search.highlight_col: The color to highlight chests in.
cookies.config.item_search.highlight_tim: The time to highlight the chests for.
cookies.config.item_search.name: Item Search
cookies.config.item_search.non_craftable: Shows all craftable items, even if you dont have all items.
cookies.config.item_search.persist_searc: Persists the search between item search screens.
Only shows items that are out of reach of the supercraft in the overview.
cookies.config.item_search.show_museum.t: Shows the status of museum items.
cookies.config.mining.crystal_hud.name: Crystal Hud
cookies.config.mining.crystal_hud.toolti:
Enables the crystal hud, shows information about current crystal status, parts available and tools available.

§cRequires the crystal player list widget to be active!
cookies.config.mining.mod_helper.name: Mod Helper
cookies.config.mining.mod_helper.tooltip: Enables the mines of divan chest helper.
cookies.config.mining.modify_commissions: Visually changes the commission item to represent the stages a commission can be in.
cookies.config.mining.name: Mining
cookies.config.mining.power_tracker.extr:
Shows extra data for specific powder types.

Gemstone: chests/min
Glacite: shafts/min
cookies.config.mining.power_tracker.name: Powder Tracker
cookies.config.mining.power_tracker.paus: Pauses the timer after a set period of time
cookies.config.mining.power_tracker.shaf:
Changes how to track mineshafts.

Enter -> Whenever you enter a mineshafts (counts all)
Find -> Counts mineshafts found, even not entered ones
cookies.config.mining.power_tracker.time: Changes the time the tracker can be inactive for, before resetting!
cookies.config.mining.power_tracker.tool: Settings related to powder tracker hud
cookies.config.mining.puzzler_solver.too: Highlight the correct block for the puzzler.
cookies.config.mining.shaft.announce.too:
Announces the shaft and it's contents to either you or all of your party!

Example: Mineshaft Entered | AMBE1 | 3L 1U
cookies.config.mining.shaft.beam.name: Enable beacon beam
cookies.config.mining.shaft.beam.tooltip: Renders a beacon beam at the corpse's location!
cookies.config.mining.shaft.box.name: Enable box
cookies.config.mining.shaft.box.tooltip: Renders a box under the corpse's location!
cookies.config.mining.shaft.color.name: Highlight color
cookies.config.mining.shaft.color.toolti:
Allows you to change the highlight color that is used for the helper.

§eOnly works for new shafts!
cookies.config.mining.shaft.enable.name: Enable Helper
cookies.config.mining.shaft.name: Mineshaft
cookies.config.mining.shaft.text.name: Enable text
cookies.config.mining.shaft.text.tooltip: Renders a text at every possible corpse's location!
cookies.config.mining.show_hotm_perk_lev: Shows the hotm perk level as item stack size.
Shows the cost for the next 10 levels
cookies.config.misc.edit_hud.name: To edit hud
cookies.config.misc.edit_hud.tooltip: Opens a screen where you can edit the hud elements!
cookies.config.misc.hide_armor.name: Hide armor bar
cookies.config.misc.hide_food.name: Hide food bar
cookies.config.misc.hide_health.name: Hide health bar
cookies.config.misc.hide_own_armor.name: Hide own armor
Hides potion effects from the inventory.
cookies.config.misc.name: Misc Config
cookies.config.misc.notifications.enable: Enables the hud for the pests timer.
Changes what pest time to use for the notifications,
depending on if a plot is sprayed it can have a 50%
reduction in cooldown.

Current -> Current plot timer
First -> First time a pest can spawn on any plot
Last -> Time at which pests can spawn everywhere
Warns you 10s before pests can spawn!
cookies.config.misc.notifications.primal: Notifies you shortly before you can spawn a primal fear
Plays a sound when sending the notification
cookies.config.misc.notifications.type.t:
Changes how you get the notifications.

Chat -> Simple chat message
Toast -> Popup in the top right of your screen
Both -> Chat message + popup
cookies.config.misc.scroll_tooltips.name: Scrollable Tooltips
cookies.config.misc.scroll_tooltips.tool:
Allows you to scroll through tooltips

CTRL + Scroll -> move horizontal
SHIFT + Scroll -> chop tooltips
cookies.config.misc.show_dye_armor.name: Show armor if dyed
cookies.config.misc.show_dye_armor.toolt: Shows the armor if a dye is applied to it.
cookies.config.misc.show_forge_recipe_st: Shows forge recipes in the recipe book
cookies.config.misc.show_item_creation_d: Shows the creation dates of items.
Show the npc value of items.
cookies.config.misc.show_museum_armor_se: Shows the components of an armor set in the description.
cookies.config.misc.show_pet_level.name: Show pet level
cookies.config.misc.show_pet_level.toolt: Shows the pet level as stack size.
cookies.config.misc.show_pet_rarity_in_l: Shows the pet level in the color of the rarity
cookies.config.misc.show_ping.name: Show Ping
cookies.config.misc.show_ping.tooltip: Shows the ping in the action bar
cookies.config.misc.sign_edit_enter_subm:
Enables hitting enter while editing a sign to submit it
shift + enter for current enter behavior.
cookies.config.misc.storage_preview.name: Storage Preview
cookies.config.misc.storage_preview.tool: Shows a preview of the content in the storage.
cookies.config.search.name: Search
cookies.config.toggled.name: Toggled
cookies.config.toggled.tooltip: Show either all on or off settings!
cookies.craft_helper.line1: Set the recipe as the selected
